question:
You saw an advertisement for a tennis course in England but you have one or two problems and can’t stay the whole course.
Write a letter to the course director. In your letter,
explain your interest in the course
describe your problems
find out if a refund is possible
text: I am writing this letter to inform you that I will  not be able to take the whole tennis course at your institution.

I have been interested in sports since I was a child. My family has so many athletes but I am the only one attracted to tennis. I won several championships when I was in college. Therefore, I can say that playing tennis is my most important passion in life.

Unfortunately, I have not been feeling well since one week ago.  My right elbow is very painful and even my arm is affected. My movements are limited and the doctor recommended some special tests and treatment as soon as possible.

I would like to know if it is possible to obtain a refund due to my current medical condition. I attached the medical reports, but please do not hesitate to tell me in case you need any further information.
I look forward to your reply.
